attributes.action: Call on the Saudi Government to overturn the sentence passed on a 19 year old rape victim of 200 lashes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The girl was sentenced to 100 lashes for breaking Sharia law by being in the same car park as men. She gang-raped 14 times and now has to suffer again at the hands of the Sharia court. After appealing her sentence was doubled.

If Britain and Saudi Arabia truly have shared values, then Prince Abdullah will, no doubt be happy to intervene.
